resources.string: To enhance your experience, GitSync uses Androidâ€™s Accessibility Service to detect when apps are opened or closed. This helps us provide tailored features without storing or sharing any data. \\n\\n Key Points: \\n Purpose: We use this service solely to improve your app experience. \\n Privacy: No data is stored or sent elsewhere. \\n Control: You can disable these permissions at any time in your device settings.
